# @jsondb-cloud/cli

> Homebrew tap for the official jsondb CLI — a command-line interface for jsondb.cloud, a hosted JSON document database.

## Install

```sh
brew tap JsonDBCloud/tap
brew install jsondb
```

## Quick Start

```sh
jsondb login
jsondb collections
jsondb push data.json --to users
```

## Commands

### Auth

`login` — authenticate with jsondb.cloud
`logout` — clear stored credentials
`whoami` — show current user and project

### Documents

`get <path>` — fetch a document by collection/id path
`create <collection>` — create a new document (reads JSON from stdin)
`update <path>` — replace a document
`patch <path>` — partially update a document
`delete <path>` — delete a document

### Collections

`collections` — list all collections
`documents <collection>` — list documents in a collection
`count <collection>` — count documents in a collection

### Import/Export

`push <file> --to <collection>` — import documents from a JSON file
`pull <collection>` — export documents to stdout

### Schema

`schema get <collection>` — show the collection schema
`schema set <collection>` — set schema (reads JSON from stdin)
`schema remove <collection>` — remove the collection schema
`validate <collection>` — validate a document against the schema

### Versions

`versions list <collection> <id>` — list document versions
`versions get <collection> <id> <version>` — get a specific version
`versions diff <collection> <id> --from <v> --to <v>` — diff two versions
`versions restore <collection> <id> <version>` — restore a version

### Webhooks

`webhooks list <collection>` — list webhooks
`webhooks create <collection>` — create a webhook
`webhooks get <collection> <id>` — get webhook details
`webhooks update <collection> <id>` — update a webhook
`webhooks delete <collection> <id>` — delete a webhook
`webhooks test <collection> <id>` — send a test event

### Keys

`keys list` — list API keys
`keys create` — create a new API key
`keys revoke <id>` — revoke an API key

### Utility

`bulk <collection>` — execute bulk operations (reads JSON from stdin)

## Global Options

`--api-key` — API key (overrides stored credentials)
`--project` — project namespace (default: `default`)
`--base-url` — API base URL (default: `https://api.jsondb.cloud`)
`--format` — output format: `json`, `raw`, `ndjson`, `table`

## Environment Variables

- `JSONDB_API_KEY` — API key (overrides stored credentials)
- `JSONDB_PROJECT` — project identifier
- `JSONDB_BASE_URL` — API base URL

## Errors

- `Unauthorized (401)` — invalid or missing API key
- `Forbidden (403)` — insufficient scope for this operation
- `Not Found (404)` — document or collection not found
- `Validation Error (400)` — schema validation failed
- `Conflict (409)` — write conflict
- `Rate Limited (429)` — too many requests
- `Quota Exceeded (429)` — plan quota exceeded
- `Document Too Large (413)` — document exceeds size limit
- `Server Error (500)` — internal server error

## Links

- Docs: https://jsondb.cloud/docs/cli
- Source: https://github.com/JsonDBCloud/cli
- Full LLM docs: see llms-full.txt in this repository
